SEARCH
Package com.example.haboob.ui.home

Class WaitlistAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseAdapter
android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Event>
com.example.haboob.ui.home.WaitlistAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter
public class WaitlistAdapter extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Event> implements android.widget.Filterable
Adapter responsible for displaying Event objects inside a ListView in the Waitlists screen. It renders the event title, poster image, and associated tags using a Flexbox layout. The adapter also supports dynamic text filtering on both event titles and tags.

This adapter keeps two lists:

  • original – the complete, unfiltered list
  • filtered – the list currently displayed to the user

Filtering never mutates the original list. A search query generates a subset placed in filtered, and the ListView is refreshed.

  • Method Details

    • getView

      @NonNull public android.view.View getView(int position, android.view.View convertView, @NonNull android.view.ViewGroup parent)
      Provides the view for one row in the ListView. This method reuses recycled views when possible for performance reasons.

      Each row displays:

      • Event title
      • Event poster image (via Glide)
      • A list of tags inside a Flexbox layout
      Specified by:
      getView in interface android.widget.Adapter
      Overrides:
      getView in class android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Event>
      Parameters:
      position - the index of the item in the current filtered list.
      convertView - an existing view to reuse, if available.
      parent - the parent ViewGroup.
      Returns:
      the fully populated row view for the Event.

    • getItem

      public Event getItem(int position)
      Returns the Event at a given position from the filtered list.
      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • getFilter

      public android.widget.Filter getFilter()
      Provides a filtering mechanism for matching user search queries against event titles and tags. Filtering:
      • Converts query to lowercase
      • Matches if title contains query
      • If title doesn't match, tag list is checked
      • Returns a list of all matching events

      Filtering does not affect the original list.

      Specified by:
      getFilter in interface android.widget.Filterable
      Overrides:
      getFilter in class android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Event>
      Returns:
      a new Filter object used by Android's ListView filtering system.

    • replaceAll

      public void replaceAll(List<Event> fresh)
      Replaces the entire dataset with a fresh list, typically after a Firestore reload. Both the original and filtered lists are replaced, and the ListView is refreshed.
      Parameters:
      fresh - the new full list of Event objects.
